'''Proceedings'''

Meeting started early at 7:30 and called to order by tritium at 8:00

'''Topics Discussed''' 

* Next Face to Face meeting will be December 14th at 2fools tavern
* We decided to skip the meeting on the 22nd and will start up again on the 29th 
* Loco logo designs and t-shirts
* Team is to review application and we will vote on it next meeting
* Discussed DVD-Audio and the application GNOME Do
 
 

What members would be contributing to the Team

* Chris Brotherton agreed to take over management of the mailing list.
* Bethanie Shaw is now co administrator with Eric Krieger in the New Mexico Ubuntu Forums

'''Assessment of Meeting'''

Another Great meeting and with record attendance.
